name: Pyramids
setup: Agent presses a button to spawn a stack of blocks forming a pyramid, then navigates to reach a golden brick at the top.
goal: Reach the golden brick with as few steps as possible.

agents.description: Single agent interacting with switch, blocks, and golden brick.

terms: +2.0 for reaching the golden brick, reduced slightly for each step taken.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Ray-based observations encoding walls, blocks, switch, and golden brick, plus switch state.
behavior_parameters.actions: 1 discrete branch with 4 actions (move forward/back or rotate left/right).
